note.p: Surgeon, medical officer, and general practitioner. LSA, Leeds, 1850; Licentiate of the Faculty of Physicians and Surgeons, Glasgow, 1858; LRCP, Edinburgh, 1859. Army doctor, 1853 and 1855. Surgeon at the P&O hospital in Calcutta. Surgeon on board SS Canadian and Cunard Royal Mail SS Canada and America. Medical officer of health, Wakefield; surgeon to Wakefield Borough Police.
England and Wales christening records, 1530–1906 (Ancestry.com, accessed 21 May 2012)
